com.strato.hidrive.api.dal

Class ShareLinkEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.strato.hidrive.api.dal.ShareLinkEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ShareLinkEntity
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A entity that describes a sharelink information associated with an remote file or directory.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Boolean hasPasswordProtection()
        Check is sharelink protected by password.
        Returns:
        true if sharelink protected with an password.

      • getStatus

        public String getStatus()
        Get sharelink status.
        Returns:
        can have one of three states: "valid": Linked file is ready for download "expired": Sharelink has exceeded a limit (ttl or download count) "invalid": The file of the sharelink does not exist.

      • getUsername

        public String getUsername()
        Get sharelink creator name.
        Returns:
        user alias name of the sharelink's creator.

      • getCreatedTimestamp

        public long getCreatedTimestamp()
        Get sharelink creation time
        Returns:
        UNIX time stamp (seconds since the epoch) when the sharelink has been created.
